Good torrent but wrong naming. The series was never called "Sharpes Rifles" just the first episode. Each episode was called something different, not seasons. 

    Sharpe's Rifles (1993)
    Sharpe's Eagle (1993)
    Sharpe's Company (1994)
    Sharpe's Enemy (1994)
    Sharpe's Honour (1994)
    Sharpe's Gold (1995)
    Sharpe's Battle (1995)
    Sharpe's Sword (1995)
    Sharpe's Regiment (1996)
    Sharpe's Siege (1996)
    Sharpe's Mission (1996)
    Sharpe's Revenge (1997)
    Sharpe's Justice (1997)
    Sharpe's Waterloo (1997)
    Sharpe's Challenge (2006)
    Sharpe's Peril (2008)
